method: 1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, mash the ripe bananas.
3. Add the all-purpose flour, baking soda, vanilla extract, sugar, vegetable oil, cinnamon, and salt to the bowl with the mashed bananas.
4. Mix well until all the ingredients are combined.
5. Pour the batter into the greased loaf pan.
6. Bake for about 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
7. Remove from the oven and let the banana bread cool for a few minutes before serving.
8. Slice and enjoy while watching your favorite show!
